== Documentation ==
The <code>DefaultCounterQuestA.psc</code> source file documentation comments for this script.

<source>
A simple counter. Placed on an Quest, then increment with another alias script (such as DefaultCounterAliasIncOnceOnActivateA). When the target value is reached, the counter sets a Quest Stage.
</source>
